entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Flurries beginning this evening. Blowing snow overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 70 this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the afternoon then mainly cloudy. Blowing snow early in the morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 16. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning.
